attributes.review: This has no right to call itself an app! 😡 it downloaded a virus as soon as i opened the app and now i have to get rid of all my electronics. Worst app EVER please delete off the app store

attributes.title: Not recommended
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it was really laggy and it didn’t want to work it was just not it and I don’t get what’s the point of this app to be honest

attributes.title: This is horrible
attributes.review: Don’t download it pls don’t just don’t This app is horrible Trump is horrible. BLACK LIVES DO MATTER!! and that’s a fact u wish I could give 0 stars! worst app ever to be made in history.

attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: The app was very glitchy I tried to go on it and I kept taking me out of the app I kept turning my WiFi on and off and nothing worked.

Tried starting the app and it opened my messages and sent “hey! Wanna bang?” to EVERYONE IN MY CONTACTS. 😡😡😡😡😡 my uncle was very displeased and shocked to see that. It’s such a shame as well I can’t use the app to worship my one and only love, donkle drumpf; CEO of white supremacy 😔💔

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this and it took hours to but then when I went into it all the news and stuff was already shown on news channel 12

attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: where do i even start.. as soon as i downloaded the app, my cat threw up on my shirt. the first thing i saw when opening the app were ads for pornhub... the app also stole all of my personal information even though i gave it no permissions. it also somehow activated my microwave which exploded and set my house on fire. bunker boy, please fix your app 😙😊🥰

attributes.title: It’s so bad
attributes.review: Honestly who even thought of making this? Is this supposed to be a joke mocking America? It’s not funny anymore! Take this down immediately it’s offensive to all Americans!!

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: This app is a complete waste of space on my phone. I should have never downloaded it. I would give it 0 stars if I could

attributes.title: Atrocious 🤢
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Took 16 hrs to download!!! I might have a virus on my phone now from this app!! Apple needs to remove this app for the safety of their Apple product users. Embarrassing Apple still has it on the App Store
